    RoundRobinLoadBalancerBuilder<ResolvedAddress,C extends LoadBalancedConnection>
    Builder for LoadBalancerFactory that creates LoadBalancer instances which use a round-robin strategy for selecting connections from a pool of addresses.

    Deprecated.
    this class will be made package-private in the future, use RoundRobinLoadBalancers to create RoundRobinLoadBalancerBuilder.
    RoundRobinLoadBalancerFactory.Builder<ResolvedAddress,C extends LoadBalancedConnection>
    Deprecated.
